sources.title: Those Awful Hats
sources.description: A short film by D W Griffith made in 1908i to remind ladies to remove their large hats.

metadata.Plot: A gentleman with a top hat, and a series of women with ever more ludicrous hats enter a movie theatre. They refuse to remove them, until a giant bucket forcibly removes one hat. All but one woman then remove their hats, and the bucket returns to remove the woman.
metadata.Actors: Linda Arvidson, John R. Cumpson, Flora Finch
